comprehensive_overview: Darshan is a scalable HPC I/O characterization tool designed to capture I/O behavior in high-performance computing applications. The darshan-util package provides a set of utilities for analyzing and visualizing the I/O data collected by Darshan.
core_features:
1. Analyzing I/O behavior in HPC applications
2. Visualizing I/O patterns and bottlenecks
3. Generating reports for understanding application I/O performance
